will receive two Special Lucky Draw tickets as a lucky double chance... One Special Luck Ticket gives you one chance to win a special
prize, and 10 Special Luck Tickets give you 10 chances to win a special prize... What's more, when you earn a Special Luck Ticket,
you'll be able to share your good fortune with up to 12 of your friends who've been adventuring with you recently! What's more,
we'll even mail each of your friends a Special Discount Coupon, a bloody great service! Of course, with this service I'm sure you've heard of it. Please note that you can share your Special Lucky Draw tickets with friends you've made into supporters...
If you've won third prize or more in the regular lottery, you and your friends can win even more in the special lottery...

craftsman experience, fishing experience, etc. Each Bonus Orb is exchanged for a "Vigor Charge" that is equal to the amount of time

Please note that even if you are in different Adventure Logs, you will not be recharged while you are still adventuring. Bonus Orb
will start Bonus Time, but the remaining time will not decrease while the adventure is suspended, so please make the most of it.

97937.「元気玉 小元気玉 超元気玉について\n ご説明させていただきます。\n<br>:
Bonus Orb Bonus Orb S Bonus Orb L Bonus Orb S Bonus Orb L Bonus Orb S Bonus Orb L The Bonus Orb is a magical jewel that, when used, will
give you a certain amount of Bonus Time, doubling the experience and gold you gain from battles and craftsmanship. Bonus Orb will be
exchanged for a "Charge of Vigor" for the time you have interrupted your adventure, up to a maximum of 440 hours! The Vigor Charge is the
same for all Adventure Logs. Bonus Orb will start Bonus Time, but your remaining time will not decrease while you are on an interrupted
adventure.

97938.「ダブルすれちがいとは ニンテンドー３ＤＳの\n 『冒険者のおでかけ便利ツール』:
Double StreetPass is a game where you use the Nintendo 3DS "Adventurer's Outing Tool" to communicate with other players in the outside
world. If you meet someone in the outside world and they meet you again in this world, you've achieved a Double StreetPass! You'll
earn points for each double crossing, and we at the Travel Concierge will give you a commemorative gift based on your points. To
get the Adventurer's Outing Tool, look on the back of the Adventurer Registration Card included in the game package.

97939.「名声とは その冒険者の名が\n どれほど世に認められているかを\n 示したもの:
Fame is a measure of how well an adventurer is known to the world. Whether it's completing quests for the people, working as
a craftsman, or slaying abandoned demons... If you work for the good of the world and the good of others, you will find fame and
fortune. Innkeepers seem to know a lot about people's fame, so if you think you've earned it, you can stay at the inn and see your fame
level. As your fame level rises, the amount of gold you'll receive will increase. Keep on increasing your fame...

97940.「クエスト案内では <%sM_OWNER><%sM_SAMA>の\n 職業やレベ:
The quest guide takes into account the occupation and level of your <%sM_SAMA><%sM_OWNER> and shows you the
quests available at that time. In this world, new quests are being added all the time. If you have any doubts about what to do, please
let us know...

97941.「サーバー移動とは その名の通り\n 別のサーバーに移動するための サービスです:
A server transfer is, as the name implies, a service that allows you to move to a different server. If you use this service,
you won't have to interrupt your adventure... You can move from one server to another without...

97942.「元気玉 小元気玉 超元気玉について\n ご説明させていただきます。\n<br>:
I would like to explain about Bonus Orb Bonus Orb S Bonus Orb L. Each of these beads is a mysterious treasure that, when used, enters
Bonus Time for a certain period of time and doubles the experience and gold you gain. The Stamp Orb is a mysterious treasure that turns
into Bonus Time for 10 minutes and doubles the number of training stamps earned from training. However, only the training stamps
are doubled, not the experience, gold, craftsmanship experience, fishing experience, etc. Each Bonus Orb is exchanged for a "Vigor
Charge" that is equal to the amount of time you have been out of the game. You can accumulate up to 440 hours of Vigor! The same
Vigor Charge is applied to all Adventure Logs. Please note that even if you are in different Adventure Logs, you will not be recharged
while you are still adventuring. Bonus Orb will start Bonus Time, but the remaining time will not decrease while the adventure is
suspended, so please make the most of it.

for Stamp Orb, which doubles your training stamps. Please note that the Stamp Orb exchange service is only available to those
who are able to train. Please note that this service is only available to those who are able to train.

110549.「元気玉 小元気玉 超元気玉について\n ご説明させていただきます。\n<br>:
Bonus Orb Bonus Orb S Bonus Orb L Bonus Orb S Bonus Orb L Bonus Orb S Bonus Orb L The Bonus Orb is a magical jewel that, when used, will
give you a certain amount of Bonus Time, doubling the experience and gold you gain from battles and craftsmanship. Bonus Orb will be
exchanged for a "Charge of Vigor" for the time you have interrupted your adventure, up to a maximum of 440 hours! The Vigor Charge is the
same for all Adventure Logs. Bonus Orb will start Bonus Time, but your remaining time will not decrease while you are on an interrupted
adventure.

110550.「ダブルすれちがいとは ニンテンドー３ＤＳの\n 『冒険者のおでかけ便利ツール』:
Double StreetPass is a game where you use the Nintendo 3DS "Adventurer's Outing Tool" to communicate with other players in the outside
world. If you meet someone in the outside world and they meet you again in this world, you've achieved a Double StreetPass! You'll
earn points for each double crossing, and we at the Travel Concierge will give you a commemorative gift based on your points. To
get the Adventurer's Outing Tool, look on the back of the Adventurer Registration Card included in the game package.

110551.「名声とは その冒険者の名が\n どれほど世に認められているかを\n 示したもの:
Fame is a measure of how well an adventurer is known to the world. Whether it's completing quests for the people, working as
a craftsman, or slaying abandoned demons... If you work for the good of the world and the good of others, you will find fame and
fortune. Innkeepers seem to know a lot about people's fame, so if you think you've earned it, you can stay at the inn and see your fame
level. As your fame level rises, the amount of gold you'll receive will increase. Keep on increasing your fame...

110552.「メタル迷宮招待券を使うと メタルなできごとが\n たくさん起こる迷宮に 行ける:
The Metal Maze Ticket will take you to a labyrinth where many metal happenings take place. You need to meet Mr. Dorothy at Port
Town Lendor to use the Metal Maze Ticket, but if you hand the Metal Maze Ticket to Mr. Dorothy, I am sure you will have a great metal
experience!

110553.「おくりもの受け取りは サポートゴールドや\n 各種チケットなどの 支給サービス:
Receiving gifts is a service that provides you with support gold, tickets, and story rewards. Support Gold: Receive Support Gold
once a week... Casino Coin Ticket: Receive a coin ticket for use in the casino every Friday... Bingo Tickets Every Friday, you'll
receive 3 bingo tickets to use in casino bingo games... Story Reward: You'll receive a reward for completing a quest... However,
please note that even if you complete the same quest multiple times, you will only receive one reward...

110554.「クエスト案内では <%sM_OWNER><%sM_SAMA>の\n 職業やレベ:
The quest guide takes into account the occupation and level of your <%sM_SAMA><%sM_OWNER> and shows you the
quests you can take. In this world, new quests are being added all the time. If you have any doubts about what to do, please try
using this...

110555.「サーバー移動とは その名の通り\n 別のサーバーに移動するための サービスです:

you won't have to interrupt your adventure... You can move from one server to another without...

110556.「元気玉 小元気玉 超元気玉について\n ご説明させていただきます。\n<br>:
I would like to explain about Bonus Orb Bonus Orb S Bonus Orb L. Each of these beads is a mysterious treasure that, when used, enters
Bonus Time for a certain period of time and doubles the experience and gold you gain. The Stamp Orb is a mysterious treasure that turns
into Bonus Time for 10 minutes and doubles the number of training stamps earned from training. However, only the training stamps
are doubled, not the experience, gold, craftsmanship experience, fishing experience, etc. Each Bonus Orb is exchanged for a "Vigor
Charge" that is equal to the amount of time you have been out of the game. You can accumulate up to 440 hours of Vigor! The same
Vigor Charge is applied to all Adventure Logs. Please note that even if you are in different Adventure Logs, you will not be recharged
while you are still adventuring. Bonus Orb will start Bonus Time, but the remaining time will not decrease while the adventure is
suspended, so please make the most of it.

110691.「もしも 旅の途中で ふくびき券を\n 手に入れましたら こちらまでお持ちくださ:
If you happen to come across any lucky draw tickets during your travels, please bring them to us... Each ticket will allow you to
take one lucky draw... Of course, you may or may not win... New adventurers and veterans alike... I hope you're lucky enough to win
one.

110692.「元気玉 小元気玉 超元気玉について\n ご説明させていただきます。\n<br>:
Bonus Orb Bonus Orb S Bonus Orb L Bonus Orb S Bonus Orb L Bonus Orb S Bonus Orb L The Bonus Orb is a magical jewel that, when used, will
give you a certain amount of Bonus Time, doubling the experience and gold you gain from battles and craftsmanship. Bonus Orb will be
exchanged for a "Charge of Vigor" for the time you have interrupted your adventure, up to a maximum of 440 hours! The Vigor Charge is the
same for all Adventure Logs. Bonus Orb will start Bonus Time, but your remaining time will not decrease while you are on an interrupted
adventure.

110693.「ダブルすれちがいとは ニンテンドー３ＤＳの\n 『冒険者のおでかけ便利ツール』:
Double StreetPass is a game where you use the Nintendo 3DS "Adventurer's Outing Tool" to communicate with other players in the outside
world. If you meet someone in the outside world and they meet you again in this world, you've achieved a Double StreetPass! You'll
earn points for each double crossing, and we at the Travel Concierge will give you a commemorative gift based on your points. To
get the Adventurer's Outing Tool, look on the back of the Adventurer Registration Card included in the game package.

110694.「名声とは その冒険者の名が\n どれほど世に認められているかを\n 示したもの:
Fame is a measure of how well an adventurer is known to the world. Whether it's completing quests for the people, working as
a craftsman, or slaying abandoned demons... If you work for the good of the world and the good of others, you will find fame and
fortune. Innkeepers seem to know a lot about people's fame, so if you think you've earned it, you can stay at the inn and see your fame
level. As your fame level rises, the amount of gold you'll receive will increase. Keep on increasing your fame...

110695.「メタル迷宮招待券を使うと メタルなできごとが\n たくさん起こる迷宮に 行ける:
The Metal Maze Ticket will take you to a labyrinth where many metal happenings take place. You need to meet Mr. Dorothy at Port
Town Lendor to use the Metal Maze Ticket, but if you hand the Metal Maze Ticket to Mr. Dorothy, I am sure you will have a great metal
experience!

110696.「おくりもの受け取りは サポートゴールドや\n 各種チケットなどの 支給サービス:
Receiving gifts is a service that provides you with support gold, tickets, and story rewards. Support Gold: Receive Support Gold
once a week... Casino Coin Ticket: Receive a coin ticket for use in the casino every Friday... Bingo Tickets Every Friday, you'll
receive 3 bingo tickets to use in casino bingo games... Story Reward: You'll receive a reward for completing a quest... However,
please note that even if you complete the same quest multiple times, you will only receive one reward...

110697.「クエスト案内では <%sM_OWNER><%sM_SAMA>の\n 職業やレベ:
The quest guide takes into account the occupation and level of your <%sM_SAMA><%sM_OWNER> and shows you the
quests you can take. In this world, new quests are being added all the time. If you have any doubts about what to do, please try
using this...

110698.「サーバー移動とは その名の通り\n 別のサーバーに移動するための サービスです:
A server transfer is, as the name implies, a service that allows you to move to a different server. If you use this service,
you won't have to interrupt your adventure... You can move from one server to another without...

110699.「元気玉 小元気玉 超元気玉について\n ご説明させていただきます。\n<br>:
I would like to explain about Bonus Orb Bonus Orb S Bonus Orb L. Each of these beads is a mysterious treasure that, when used, enters
Bonus Time for a certain period of time and doubles the experience and gold you gain. The Stamp Orb is a mysterious treasure that turns
into Bonus Time for 10 minutes and doubles the number of training stamps earned from training. However, only the training stamps
are doubled, not the experience, gold, craftsmanship experience, fishing experience, etc. Each Bonus Orb is exchanged for a "Vigor
Charge" that is equal to the amount of time you have been out of the game. You can accumulate up to 440 hours of Vigor! The same
Vigor Charge is applied to all Adventure Logs. Please note that even if you are in different Adventure Logs, you will not be recharged
while you are still adventuring. Bonus Orb will start Bonus Time, but the remaining time will not decrease while the adventure is
suspended, so please make the most of it.

for Stamp Orb, which doubles your training stamps. Please note that the Stamp Orb exchange service is only available to those
who are able to train. Please note that this service is only available to those who are able to train.

110836.「ダブルすれちがいとは ニンテンドー３ＤＳの\n 『冒険者のおでかけ便利ツール』:
Double StreetPass is a game where you use the Nintendo 3DS "Adventurer's Outing Tool" to communicate with other players in the outside
world. If you meet someone in the outside world and they meet you again in this world, you've achieved a Double StreetPass! You'll
earn points for each double crossing, and we at the Travel Concierge will give you a commemorative gift based on your points. To
get the Adventurer's Outing Tool, look on the back of the Adventurer Registration Card included in the game package.

110837.「名声とは その冒険者の名が\n どれほど世に認められているかを\n 示したもの:
Fame is a measure of how well an adventurer is known to the world. Whether it's completing quests for the people, working as
a craftsman, or slaying abandoned demons... If you work for the good of the world and the good of others, you will find fame and
fortune. Innkeepers seem to know a lot about people's fame, so if you think you've earned it, you can stay at the inn and see your fame
level. As your fame level rises, the amount of gold you'll receive will increase. Keep on increasing your fame...

once a week... Casino Coin Ticket: Receive a coin ticket for use in the casino every Friday... Bingo Tickets Every Friday, you'll

110842.「元気玉 小元気玉 超元気玉について\n ご説明させていただきます。\n<br>:
I would like to explain about Bonus Orb Bonus Orb S Bonus Orb L. Each of these beads is a mysterious treasure that, when used, enters
Bonus Time for a certain period of time and doubles the experience and gold you gain. The Stamp Orb is a mysterious treasure that turns
into Bonus Time for 10 minutes and doubles the number of training stamps earned from training. However, only the training stamps
are doubled, not the experience, gold, craftsmanship experience, fishing experience, etc. Each Bonus Orb is exchanged for a "Vigor
Charge" that is equal to the amount of time you have been out of the game. You can accumulate up to 440 hours of Vigor! The same
Vigor Charge is applied to all Adventure Logs. Please note that even if you are in different Adventure Logs, you will not be recharged
while you are still adventuring. Bonus Orb will start Bonus Time, but the remaining time will not decrease while the adventure is
suspended, so please make the most of it.

110927.「お待たせいたしました！\n <%sM_OWNER>さまを サービス会員に\n:
Thank you for your patience! We've registered <%sM_OWNER> as a service member! If you wish to use our service, please ask for the travel

110950.「<%sM_OWNER>さまは ダブルすれちがい報告は\n はじめてですね。それ:
<%sM_OWNER>, this is your first Double Passing Report... Let me give you a brief explanation... What is Double StreetPass? Use
the Nintendo 3DS "Adventurer's Outing Tool" to communicate with people you meet in the outside world. If you and the person you
passed in the outside world pass each other again in this world, you've achieved a Double StreetPass! You'll earn points for each
double crossing, and we at the Travel Concierge will give you a commemorative gift based on your points. For information on how
to obtain the Adventurer's Outing Tool, please refer to the back of the Adventurer Registration Card included in the game
package... Let's get started.

110951.「<%sM_OWNER>さまは <%nL_MEGURINOW>名の方と\n ダブ:

accumulated <%dL_MEGURIPOINT> points...<bw_break>

110952.「<%sL_ITEM>だね。これは\n 港町レンドアにいる ドロシーに手渡すと\:
<%sL_ITEM>? Give this to Dorothy in Port Lendor and you can go to the Metal Maze.
You currently have <%dL_CTIME> Charge Hour(s) remaining. You can exchange for up to <%dL_MAXNUM> of them. How many would you like?

110953.「なんと！ 新しく メタル迷宮招待券への\n 交換できるように なったよー。\n:
What a surprise! You can exchange your Metal Maze Ticket for a Metal Maze Ticket using the same procedure you use to exchange Bonus Orbs.
To use Metal Maze Ticket, you need to meet Dorothy at Port Lendor by yourself. Please try to exchange your ticket with
Dorothy.

110954.「そうですか……。\n 登録は いつでもできますので\n 気が変わったら また:

so if you change your mind, please come
back...

110958.「ところで 私から 新しくカジノコインを\n <%sM_OWNER>に 渡せるよ:
By the way, I can now give my new casino coin tickets to <%sM_OWNER>... I can give him the casino coin tickets that are provided by the
Travel Concierge every Friday... The ticket is worth 100 casino coins! We're going to hit the jackpot in this gorgeous casino game...

110959.「ところで 新しく 特訓元気玉を\n 交換をできるように なったんだよー。 \n:
By the way, you can now exchange Stamp Orb for Stamp Orb. Stamp Orb can be exchanged for "Genki Charge" and the number of Stamp Orb can
be exchanged is limited to 40 at a time. Stamp Orb is a mysterious pearl that doubles the number of training stamps you can get from
training. However, the only thing that is doubled with Stamp Orb is the special training stamp. When you use the Stamp Orb, the Bonus
Time will start, but the remaining time will not decrease while the adventure is suspended, so be sure to use it properly.

110960.「今 <%sM_OWNER>に 私から\n 案内できるクエストは こんなところだ:

later...<bw_break>

110962.「ところで 私から 新しく\n クエストの案内が できるようになったのー。\n<:
By the way, I can now show you quests... I'll look at the <%sM_OWNER>'s profession and level and show them the quests available at
that time. There's a lot of new quests being added to this world. If you have any doubts about what to do, please contact me...

110963.「どうかなー。気に入らないようだったら\n 別のクエストを 案内するからねー。\:
Well... If you don't like what you see, I can
give you another quest. Or you can ask him to
take you on another quest.<bw_break>

110964.「こちらは プライベートコンシェルジュです。\n 冒険者の皆さまに様々なサービス:
This is a private concierge. We are dispatched by the World Association of Innkeepers to provide a variety of services to adventurers.
We would like to introduce some of the services we provide. First of all, we offer a service to support your wallet! Register with
our concierge and you will receive one Port Gold per week. Secondly, Casino Token Present Service! This is a service that gives you a
coin ticket that can be used at Casino every Friday. Bonus Orb Exchange Service! This service allows you to exchange your idle time
for Bonus Orb which doubles your experience. Next is the Stamp Orb Exchange Service! This service allows you to exchange your idle time
for Stamp Orb, which doubles your training stamps. Please note that the Stamp Orb exchange service is only available to those
who are able to train. Please note that this service is only available to those who are able to train.

I'm sorry... I can't move the server...
Please give it a moment and try again...<end>

110974.「それでは <%sM_OWNER>さま\n サーバー移動の旅 いってらっしゃいま:
So, <%sM_OWNER>, have a great server
migration journey!<bw_break>

110976.「かしこまりました。\n サーバー移動は 冒険を中断せずに\n 他のサーバーへ:
Yes, sir. You can move from one server to
another without interrupting your
adventure...<bw_break>

110977.「もしも 旅の途中で ふくびき券を\n 手に入れましたら こちらまでお持ちくださ:
If you happen to come across any lucky draw tickets during your travels, please bring them to us... Each ticket will allow you to
take one lucky draw... Of course, you may or may not win... New adventurers and veterans alike... I hope you're lucky enough to win
one.

110978.「元気玉 小元気玉 超元気玉について\n ご説明させていただきます。\n<br>:
Bonus Orb Bonus Orb S Bonus Orb L Bonus Orb S Bonus Orb L Bonus Orb S Bonus Orb L The Bonus Orb is a magical jewel that, when used, will
give you a certain amount of Bonus Time, doubling the experience and gold you gain from battles and craftsmanship. Bonus Orb will be
exchanged for a "Charge of Vigor" for the time you have interrupted your adventure, up to a maximum of 440 hours! The Vigor Charge is the
same for all Adventure Logs. Bonus Orb will start Bonus Time, but your remaining time will not decrease while you are on an interrupted
adventure.

110979.「ダブルすれちがいとは ニンテンドー３ＤＳの\n 『冒険者のおでかけ便利ツール』:
Double StreetPass is a game where you use the Nintendo 3DS "Adventurer's Outing Tool" to communicate with other players in the outside
world. If you meet someone in the outside world and they meet you again in this world, you've achieved a Double StreetPass! You'll
earn points for each double crossing, and we at the Travel Concierge will give you a commemorative gift based on your points. To
get the Adventurer's Outing Tool, look on the back of the Adventurer Registration Card included in the game package.

110980.「名声とは その冒険者の名が\n どれほど世に認められているかを\n 示したもの:
Fame is a measure of how well an adventurer is known to the world. Whether it's completing quests for the people, working as
a craftsman, or slaying abandoned demons... If you work for the good of the world and the good of others, you will find fame and
fortune. Innkeepers seem to know a lot about people's fame, so if you think you've earned it, you can stay at the inn and see your fame
level. As your fame level rises, the amount of gold you'll receive will increase. Keep on increasing your fame...

110981.「メタル迷宮招待券を使うと メタルなできごとが\n たくさん起こる迷宮に 行ける:
The Metal Maze Ticket will take you to a labyrinth where many metal happenings take place. You need to meet Mr. Dorothy at Port
Town Lendor to use the Metal Maze Ticket, but if you hand the Metal Maze Ticket to Mr. Dorothy, I am sure you will have a great metal
experience!

110982.「おくりもの受け取りは サポートゴールドや\n 各種チケットなどの 支給サービス:
Receiving gifts is a service that provides you with support gold, tickets, and story rewards. Support Gold: Receive Support Gold
once a week... Casino Coin Ticket: Receive a coin ticket for use in the casino every Friday... Bingo Tickets Every Friday, you'll
receive 3 bingo tickets to use in casino bingo games... Story Reward: You'll receive a reward for completing a quest... However,
please note that even if you complete the same quest multiple times, you will only receive one reward...

110983.「クエスト案内では <%sM_OWNER>の\n 職業やレベルも考慮して その時:
The quest guide takes into account the occupation and level of the <%sM_OWNER> and shows you the quests available at that time.
New quests are being added all the time in this world. If you're ever in doubt about what to do, just ask...

110984.「サーバー移動とは その名の通り\n 別のサーバーに移動するための サービスです:
A server transfer is, as the name implies, a service that allows you to move to a different server. If you use this service,
you won't have to interrupt your adventure... You can move from one server to another without...

110985.「元気玉 小元気玉 超元気玉について\n ご説明させていただきます。\n<br>:
I would like to explain about Bonus Orb Bonus Orb S Bonus Orb L. Each of these beads is a mysterious treasure that, when used, enters
Bonus Time for a certain period of time and doubles the experience and gold you gain. The Stamp Orb is a mysterious treasure that turns
into Bonus Time for 10 minutes and doubles the number of training stamps earned from training. However, only the training stamps
are doubled, not the experience, gold, craftsmanship experience, fishing experience, etc. Each Bonus Orb is exchanged for a "Vigor
Charge" that is equal to the amount of time you have been out of the game. You can accumulate up to 440 hours of Vigor! The same
Vigor Charge is applied to all Adventure Logs. Please note that even if you are in different Adventure Logs, you will not be recharged
while you are still adventuring. Bonus Orb will start Bonus Time, but the remaining time will not decrease while the adventure is
suspended, so please make the most of it.

110986.「３等以上の 当選となりますので\n スペシャルふくびき券 <%nM_Hukub:
For winning at least 3rd prize, you will
receive <%dM_Hukubiki_Num> SP Lottery Tickets. Furthermore...
<bw_break>

110987.「フレンドの方から 最近いっしょに冒険した順に\n 最大１２名選び おすそ分けで:
We will select up to 12 friends you have
recently adventured with, and send them
<%dL_Hukubiki_Num> SP Lottery Tickets via mail.
<bw_break>

110988.「今回 スペシャルふくびき券を 郵送できた\n フレンドの皆様は こちらになりま:
Here is the list of friends that will be mailed SP Lottery Tickets this time.
They will receive one letter per ticket. Please note, we will not send mail to any friends whose mailboxes are full.

110989.「フレンドの方とともに スペシャルふくびきで\n さらなる幸せを つかんでくださ:
Please play the SP Draw with your friends
for more fun and happiness!
<bw_break>

110990.「確認したところ <%sM_OWNER>さまには\n スペシャルふくびき券を 受:
After checking, it seems that <%sM_OWNER>
doesn't have any friends who can receive
special coupons...<bw_break>

110991.「おや？ <%sM_OWNER>さまの\n どうぐかばんに 空きが ないようです:
Hmm? It looks like <%sM_OWNER> doesn't have a vacancy in his inventory, so we'll have to hold onto your special coupon... If you'd
like to visit the Travel Concierge after you've made room in your inventory, we can give you a special coupon...

110992.「現在 スペシャルふくびき券が <%dL_ITEMNUM>枚あります。\n どう:
I currently have <%dL_ITEMNUM> special coupons... It looks like your bag is full, so I'm afraid I can't give you any more special

We would like to introduce some of the services we provide. First of all, we offer a service to support your wallet! Register with
our concierge and you will receive one Port Gold per week. Secondly, Casino Token Present Service! This is a service that gives you a
coin ticket that can be used at Casino every Friday. Bonus Orb Exchange Service! This service allows you to exchange your idle time
for Bonus Orb which doubles your experience. Next is the Stamp Orb Exchange Service! This service allows you to exchange your idle time
for Stamp Orb, which doubles your training stamps. Please note that the Stamp Orb exchange service is only available to those
who are able to train. Please note that this service is only available to those who are able to train.

111120.「もしも 旅の途中で ふくびき券を\n 手に入れましたら こちらまでお持ちくださ:
If you happen to come across any lucky draw tickets during your travels, please bring them to us... Each ticket will allow you to
take one lucky draw... Of course, you may or may not win... New adventurers and veterans alike... I hope you're lucky enough to win
one.

111121.「元気玉 小元気玉 超元気玉について\n ご説明させていただきます。 \n<br:
Bonus Orb Bonus Orb S Bonus Orb L Bonus Orb S Bonus Orb L Bonus Orb S Bonus Orb L The Bonus Orb is a magical jewel that, when used, will
give you a certain amount of Bonus Time, doubling the experience and gold you gain from battles and craftsmanship. Bonus Orb will be
exchanged for a "Charge of Vigor" for the time you have interrupted your adventure, up to a maximum of 440 hours! The Vigor Charge is the
same for all Adventure Logs. Bonus Orb will start Bonus Time, but your remaining time will not decrease while you are on an interrupted
adventure.

111122.「ダブルすれちがいとは ニンテンドー３ＤＳの\n 『冒険者のおでかけ便利ツール』:
Double StreetPass is a game where you use the Nintendo 3DS "Adventurer's Outing Tool" to communicate with other players in the outside
world. If you meet someone in the outside world and they meet you again in this world, you've achieved a Double StreetPass! You'll
earn points for each double crossing, and we at the Travel Concierge will give you a commemorative gift based on your points. To
get the Adventurer's Outing Tool, look on the back of the Adventurer Registration Card included in the game package.

111123.「名声とは その冒険者の名が\n どれほど世に認められているかを\n 示したもの:
Fame is a measure of how well an adventurer is known to the world. Whether it's completing quests for the people, working as
a craftsman, or slaying abandoned demons... If you work for the good of the world and the good of others, you will find fame and
fortune. Innkeepers seem to know a lot about people's fame, so if you think you've earned it, you can stay at the inn and see your fame
level. As your fame level rises, the amount of gold you'll receive will increase. Keep on increasing your fame...

111124.「メタル迷宮招待券を使うと メタルなできごとが\n たくさん起こる迷宮に 行ける:
The Metal Maze Ticket will take you to a labyrinth where many metal happenings take place. You need to meet Mr. Dorothy at Port
Town Lendor to use the Metal Maze Ticket, but if you hand the Metal Maze Ticket to Mr. Dorothy, I am sure you will have a great metal
experience!

111125.「おくりもの受け取りは サポートゴールドや\n 各種チケットなどの 支給サービス:
Receiving gifts is a service that provides you with support gold, tickets, and story rewards. Support Gold: Receive Support Gold
once a week... Casino Coin Ticket: Receive a coin ticket for use in the casino every Friday... Bingo Tickets Every Friday, you'll
receive 3 bingo tickets to use in casino bingo games... Story Reward: You'll receive a reward for completing a quest... However,
please note that even if you complete the same quest multiple times, you will only receive one reward...

111126.「クエスト案内では お前の\n 職業やレベルも考慮して その時のお前に\n ふさ:
The Quest Guide takes into account your profession and your level, and guides you to the quests that are most appropriate for you
at the time. New quests are being added to this world all the time. If you're ever in doubt about what to do, just ask me.

111127.「サーバー移動とは その名の通り\n 別のサーバーに移動するための サービスです:
A server transfer is, as the name implies, a service that allows you to move to a different server. If you use this service,
you won't have to interrupt your adventure... You can move from one server to another without...

111128.「元気玉 小元気玉 超元気玉について\n ご説明させていただきます。\n<br>:
I would like to explain about Bonus Orb Bonus Orb S Bonus Orb L. Each of these beads is a mysterious treasure that, when used, enters
Bonus Time for a certain period of time and doubles the experience and gold you gain. The Stamp Orb is a mysterious treasure that turns
into Bonus Time for 10 minutes and doubles the number of training stamps earned from training. However, only the training stamps
are doubled, not the experience, gold, craftsmanship experience, fishing experience, etc. Each Bonus Orb is exchanged for a "Vigor
Charge" that is equal to the amount of time you have been out of the game. You can accumulate up to 440 hours of Vigor! The same
Vigor Charge is applied to all Adventure Logs. Please note that even if you are in different Adventure Logs, you will not be recharged
while you are still adventuring. Bonus Orb will start Bonus Time, but the remaining time will not decrease while the adventure is
suspended, so please make the most of it.

111407.「元気玉 小元気玉 超元気玉について\n ご説明させていただきます。\n<br>:
Bonus Orb Bonus Orb S Bonus Orb L Bonus Orb S Bonus Orb L Bonus Orb S Bonus Orb L The Bonus Orb is a magical jewel that, when used, will
give you a certain amount of Bonus Time, doubling the experience and gold you gain from battles and craftsmanship. Bonus Orb will be
exchanged for a "Charge of Vigor" for the time you have interrupted your adventure, up to a maximum of 440 hours! The Vigor Charge is the
same for all Adventure Logs. Bonus Orb will start Bonus Time, but your remaining time will not decrease while you are on an interrupted
adventure.

111408.「ダブルすれちがいとは ニンテンドー３ＤＳの\n 『冒険者のおでかけ便利ツール』:
Double StreetPass is a game where you use the Nintendo 3DS "Adventurer's Outing Tool" to communicate with other players in the outside
world. If you meet someone in the outside world and they meet you again in this world, you've achieved a Double StreetPass! You'll
earn points for each double crossing, and we at the Travel Concierge will give you a commemorative gift based on your points. To
get the Adventurer's Outing Tool, look on the back of the Adventurer Registration Card included in the game package.

111409.「名声とは その冒険者の名が\n どれほど世に認められているかを\n 示したもの:
Fame is a measure of how well an adventurer is known to the world. Whether it's completing quests for the people, working as
a craftsman, or slaying abandoned demons... If you work for the good of the world and the good of others, you will find fame and
fortune. Innkeepers seem to know a lot about people's fame, so if you think you've earned it, you can stay at the inn and see your fame
level. As your fame level rises, the amount of gold you'll receive will increase. Keep on increasing your fame...

111410.「メタル迷宮招待券を使うと メタルなできごとが\n たくさん起こる迷宮に 行ける:
The Metal Maze Ticket will take you to a labyrinth where many metal happenings take place. You need to meet Mr. Dorothy at Port
Town Lendor to use the Metal Maze Ticket, but if you hand the Metal Maze Ticket to Mr. Dorothy, I am sure you will have a great metal
experience!

111411.「おくりもの受け取りは サポートゴールドや\n 各種チケットなどの 支給サービス:
Receiving gifts is a service that provides you with support gold, tickets, and story rewards. Support Gold: Receive Support Gold
once a week... Casino Coin Ticket: Receive a coin ticket for use in the casino every Friday... Bingo Tickets Every Friday, you'll
receive 3 bingo tickets to use in casino bingo games... Story Reward: You'll receive a reward for completing a quest... However,
please note that even if you complete the same quest multiple times, you will only receive one reward...

111412.「クエスト案内では <%sM_OWNER>の\n 職業やレベルに合わせて 受けら:
In the quest guide, you'll find a list of quests that are available for <%sM_OWNER>'s profession and level. New quests are being
added to this world all the time, so if you're not sure where to start, just ask me.

111413.「サーバー移動とは その名の通り\n 別のサーバーに移動するための サービスです:
A server transfer is, as the name implies, a service that allows you to move to a different server. If you use this service,
you won't have to interrupt your adventure... You can move from one server to another without...

111414.「元気玉 小元気玉 超元気玉について\n ご説明させていただきます。\n<br>:
I would like to explain about Bonus Orb Bonus Orb S Bonus Orb L. Each of these beads is a mysterious treasure that, when used, enters
Bonus Time for a certain period of time and doubles the experience and gold you gain. The Stamp Orb is a mysterious treasure that turns
into Bonus Time for 10 minutes and doubles the number of training stamps earned from training. However, only the training stamps
are doubled, not the experience, gold, craftsmanship experience, fishing experience, etc. Each Bonus Orb is exchanged for a "Vigor
Charge" that is equal to the amount of time you have been out of the game. You can accumulate up to 440 hours of Vigor! The same
Vigor Charge is applied to all Adventure Logs. Please note that even if you are in different Adventure Logs, you will not be recharged
while you are still adventuring. Bonus Orb will start Bonus Time, but the remaining time will not decrease while the adventure is
suspended, so please make the most of it.

111415.「３等以上の 当選となりますので\n スペシャルふくびき券 <%nM_Hukub:
For winning at least 3rd prize, you will
receive <%dM_Hukubiki_Num> SP Lottery Tickets. Furthermore...
<bw_break>

<%dL_Hukubiki_Num> SP Lottery Tickets via mail.
<bw_break>

They will receive one letter per ticket. Please note, we will not send mail to any friends whose mailboxes are full.

111433.「ふくびきの新しいサービス……\n スペシャルふくびきについて ご説明します。\:
New Lucky Draw Service... Explanation of the Special Luck Draw... If you win the third prize or more in the regular Lucky Draw, you
will receive two Special Lucky Draw tickets as a lucky double chance... Each Special Luck Ticket is good for one try at the Special
Luck... What's more, when you earn a Special Luck Ticket, you'll be able to share your good fortune with up to 12 of your friends
who've been adventuring with you recently! What's more, we'll even mail one Special Discount Coupon to each of your friends... a
bloody great service! Of course, this service won't diminish <%sM_OWNER>'s Special Discount Coupons, so don't worry... I'm sure you've
heard of it, but I'm not sure if you've heard of it. If you win third prize or more in the regular lottery, you and your friends can win
even more in the special lottery...

111436.「<%sL_ITEM>だね。これは 使うと１０分間\n 特訓元気タイムになって:

choose!

for those adventurers who can receive support gold, I'll be giving you a week's worth of support gold! This special support gold is a
gift from the World Association of Innkeepers, so use it as you see fit... You'll be receiving your support gold every
Friday from now on, so...

121502.「お待ちしておりました <%sM_OWNER><%sM_SAMA>。\n サポー:
Thank you for your patience <%sM_SAMA><%sM_OWNER>. I'm happy to announce that the Support Gold pickup day has been
changed to every Friday... As such, all adventurers who are eligible to receive Support Gold will receive a week's worth of
Support Gold right here... This special support gold is a gift from the World Association of Innkeepers, so please make use
of it in your adventures... Please be sure to pick up your Support Gold every Friday from now on...

121503.「ああ <%sM_OWNER>。待ってたんだ。\n サポートゴールドの受け取り日:
Oh, <%sM_OWN... Wait... Tell them that the support gold pickup day has been changed to every Friday, so... So, for those of you
adventurers who are eligible to receive support gold, we're giving you a week's worth of support gold... This special support gold
is a gift from the World Association of Innkeepers, so you can spend it as you wish... You'll be receiving your support gold
every Friday from now on, so don't forget...

121504.「待っていたよ <%sM_OWNER>。\n サポートゴールドの受け取り日が 毎:
We've been waiting for you <%sM_OWN... I'm happy to report that support gold pickup days have been changed to every Friday... So, for
those adventurers who are eligible to receive support gold, we will be giving away a week's worth of support gold... This special support
gold is a gift from the World Association of Innkeepers, so feel free to spend it as you see fit... You will receive your support gold
every Friday from now on, so please remember...

121505.「待っていたわ <%sM_OWNER>。\n サポートゴールドの受け取り日が 毎:
We've been waiting for you. <%sM_OWN... I'm happy to report that support gold pickup days have been changed to every Friday... And so,
for those adventurers who are eligible to receive support gold, I give you a special week's worth of support gold right here...
This special support gold is a gift from the World Association of Innkeepers, so feel free to spend it as you see fit... You'll be
receiving your support gold every Friday from now on, so please remember...

121506.「お待ちしておりました <pc>さま。\n サポートゴールドの受け取り日が 毎週:
We've been expecting you Sir. I'd like to inform you that the day for receiving Support Gold has been changed to every Friday... Therefore, all adventurers
who are eligible to receive Support Gold will receive a week's worth of Support Gold right here... This special support gold is a gift
from the World Association of Innkeepers, so please make use of it in your adventures... Please be sure to pick up your Support Gold
every Friday from now on...

121598.「あれ……<%sM_OWNER><%sM_SAMA>。今回お渡しする\n 特別サ:

give you. If you have enough money in your possession to come back and receive the special support gold...

121602.「おや……<%sM_OWNER><%sM_SAMA>。今回お渡しする\n 特別サ:

The last 10-pack didn't finish properly, so

126304.「これで すべての賞品が 決定しました。\n こちらが 今回の１０連ふくびき賞品:

you've won from your 10 Draw.
<end>

126305.「ところで 私ども 旅のコンシェルジュでは\n この度 新しいサービスを 始めま:
By the way, I'd like to introduce a new service we've started here at Travel Concierge. It's called the "10-Pack" service!
It's a service that allows you to collect 10 coupons at once... We've got a lot of work to do. You can also use your coupons at the same
time... We'll give you your 10 prizes on the spot, but if you can't take them with you, our travel concierge will take care of them
for you... However, please note that you will not be able to win any more prizes until you pick up all your prizes...

126361.「この度 スペシャルふくびきに\n さらに 新しいサービスを始めましたので\n:
I'd like to introduce you to a new service we've been working on... We're calling it the Special 10-Strike Discount Service! We've
been working on a new service for a while now... The Special 10-Pack is a service that allows you to receive 10 special coupons at
once... We'll give you the 10 prizes you've won on the spot, but if you can't keep them, our travel concierge will keep them for
you... Please note, however, that you will not be able to win any more prizes until you have picked up all your prizes...

132639.「かしこまりました。\n ストーリーや クエストの経験値を\n 『預ける』設定に:
Yes, sir... We've set your story and quest experience to "Keep"... From now on, when you complete a story or quest, we'll store the
experience for you, so you can come back when you want to receive it...

132640.「ところで 私ども 旅のコンシェルジュで\n 新しいサービスを 始めましたので\:
By the way, I'd like to introduce a new service we've started here at Travel Concierge. It's called the "Keep Your
Experience" service! You can decide when you want to receive the experience you get from completing stories and quests... I'm not sure
if this is a good idea or not, but it's a good idea. You'll be able to receive experience from storylines and quests
whenever you want, so please use this option... There's no limit to the amount of experience you can keep, but you can only
keep one level of experience in your Orb of Mastery... Also, once you reach the level limit, you will not receive any more
experience and it will be lost. However, please note that you must be at least level 15 to use this service...

132641.「『経験値お預かり設定』ですね。こちらは\n ストーリーや クエストで得られる経:
This is a service that allows you to keep your experience... This is a service that allows you to temporarily keep the experience
you gain from stories and quests...

134132.現在は 『クリア時に受け取る』設定です。\n変更したい場合は 『おくりもの受け取:
The current setting is "Receive On Clear". If you'd like to change this setting, select "Gift Reception" at any concierge.
In the "Gift Reception" menu, you can change the method of obtaining experience points by selecting "Saved EXP Settings".

135771.「ところで お預かり経験値サービスで\n 新たに クエストの経験値も預かれること:
By the way, we'd like to announce that we've added a new feature to the "Keep Experience" service... As before, if you select the
"Keep" option, you'll be able to keep your story clear experience as well as your quest clear experience... However, we'll only be
able to keep your quest experience the first time you complete it... When replaying the game, even if you set it to "Keep", you'll
receive it on the spot when you complete the game, so please understand beforehand...

266799.「名声とは その冒険者の名が\n どれほど世に認められているかを\n 示したもの:
Fame is a measure of how well an adventurer is known to the world. Whether it's completing quests for the people, working as
a craftsman, or slaying abandoned demons... If you do things for the good of the world and the good of others, you will find fame
and fortune. Innkeepers seem to know a lot about people's fame, so if you think you've earned it, you can stay at the inn, and your
fame level will rise. As your fame level increases, so does the amount of support gold you receive. As you gain more and more
fame...

266800.「名声とは その冒険者の名が\n どれほど世に認められているかを\n 示したもの:
Fame is a measure of how well an adventurer is known to the world. Whether it's completing quests for the people, working as
a craftsman, or slaying abandoned demons... If you do these things for the good of the world, you will find fame and fortune.
Innkeepers seem to know a lot about people's fame, so if you think you've earned it, you can stay at the inn and see your fame level.
As your fame level rises, the amount of gold you'll receive will increase. Please keep increasing your fame...

a craftsman, or slaying abandoned demons... If you do things for the good of the world and the good of others, you will find fame

your fame level. As your fame level increases, so does the amount of support gold you receive. The more fame you gain...

266802.「名声とは その冒険者の名が\n どれほど世に認められているかを\n 示したもの:
Fame is a measure of how well an adventurer is known to the world! Whether you're completing quests for people, working as a
craftsman, or slaying abandoned demons... If you act for the good of the world and the good of others, you will earn your fame!
Innkeepers seem to be well versed in the ways of fame, so if you think you've gained fame, stay at the inn to find out your fame level.
As your fame level rises, the amount of gold you'll receive will increase. I hope you'll continue to increase your fame!

267155.「元気玉 小元気玉 超元気玉について\n ご説明させていただきます。\n<br>:
I would like to explain about Bonus Orb Bonus Orb S Bonus Orb L. When used, these items are a mysterious item that doubles your experience
and gold for a certain period of time. The Stamp Orb is a magical item that turns into Bonus Time for 10 minutes and doubles the
number of training stamps earned from special training. However, only the training stamps are doubled, not the experience, gold,
craftsman experience, fishing experience, etc. Each Bonus Orb is exchanged for a "Vigor Charge" that is equal to the amount of time
you have been out of the game. You can accumulate up to 440 hours of Vigor! The same Vigor Charge is applied to all Adventure Logs.
Please note that even if you are in different Adventure Logs, you will not be recharged while you are still adventuring. Bonus Orb
will start Bonus Time, but the remaining time will not decrease while the adventure is suspended, so please make the most of it.

267163.「ところで 私ども 旅のコンシェルジュで\n この度 新しいサービスを始めました:
By the way, we at Travel Concierge are pleased to introduce our new service. The name of the service is "Stamp Orb Exchange Service"! Stamp
Orb can be exchanged for "Genki Charge" and the number of Stamp Orb can be exchanged at one time is limited to 40. Stamp Orb is a
mysterious pearl that doubles the number of training stamps you get from training. However, only the special training stamps are
doubled with the Stamp Orb. When you use the Stamp Orb, the Bonus Time will start, but the remaining time will not decrease while the
adventure is suspended, so please make good use of it.

267195.「おくりもの受け取りは サポートゴールドや\n 各種チケットなどの 支給サービス:
You can receive support gold, tickets, and story rewards... Support Gold: Every Friday, you'll receive Support Gold... Casino Coin
Tickets: Every Friday, you'll receive one coin ticket for use in the casino... Bingo Tickets Every Friday you will receive 3 bingo
tickets for use in casino bingo games... Casino Play Tickets: Every Friday, you'll receive 3 Casino Play Tickets for bingo and
backgammon... Story Rewards are rewards for completing quests that you didn't receive... However, please note that even if you
complete the same quest multiple times, you will only receive one reward... You can choose when you want to receive the
experience you earn for completing stories and quests... You can either choose to receive the experience as-is (when you
complete the quest), or you can choose to leave it with us and we'll collect it for you. However, please note that you can only
keep your quest experience the first time you complete it... Please use this service to receive your gifts. I hope you find it useful in your adventures...

time... We'll give you your 10 prizes on the spot, but if you can't take them with you, our travel concierge will take care of them
for you... However, please note that you will not be able to win any more prizes until you pick up all your prizes...

267299.「ところで 私ども 旅のコンシェルジュでは\n この度 新しいサービスを 始めま:
By the way, I'd like to introduce a new service we've started here at Travel Concierge. It's called "Casino Play Ticket
Service"! Every Friday, we'll give you tickets to play bingo and backgammon at the casino! You'll receive 3 tickets! One ticket
is good for one round of bingo, and three tickets are good for one round of backgammon. You can choose whether you want to play bingo
or sugoroku...

267331.「ふくびきの新しいサービス……\n スペシャルふくびきについて ご説明します。\:
New Lucky Draw Service... Explanation of the Special Luck Draw... If you win the third prize or more in the regular Lucky Draw, you
will receive two Special Lucky Draw tickets as a lucky double chance... One Special Luck Ticket gives you one chance to win a special
prize, and 10 Special Luck Tickets give you 10 chances to win a special prize... What's more, when you earn a Special Luck Ticket,
you'll be able to share your good fortune with up to 12 of your friends who've been adventuring with you recently! What's more,
we'll even mail each of your friends a Special Discount Coupon, a bloody great service! Of course, with this service I'm sure you've heard of it. Please note that you can share your Special Lucky Draw tickets with friends you've made into supporters...
If you've won third prize or more in the regular lottery, you and your friends can win even more in the special lottery...

267335.「この度 スペシャルふくびきに\n さらに 新しいサービスを始めましたので\n:
I'd like to introduce you to a new service we've been working on... We're calling it the Special 10-Strike Discount Service! We've
been working on a new service for a while now... The Special 10-Pack is a service that allows you to receive 10 special coupons at
once... We'll give you the 10 prizes you've won on the spot, but if you can't keep them, our travel concierge will keep them for
you... Please note, however, that you will not be able to win any more prizes until you have picked up all your prizes...

267367.「ところで 私ども 旅のコンシェルジュで\n 新しいサービスを 始めましたので\:
By the way, I'd like to introduce a new service we've started here at Travel Concierge. It's called the "Keep Your
Experience" service! You can decide when you want to receive the experience you get from completing stories and quests... I'm not sure
if this is a good idea or not, but it's a good idea. You'll be able to receive experience from storylines and quests
whenever you want, so please use this option... There's no limit to the amount of experience you can keep, but you can only
keep one level of experience in your Orb of Mastery... Also, once you reach the level limit, you will not receive any more
experience and it will be lost. However, please note that you must be at least level 15 to use this service...

267371.「ところで お預かり経験値サービスで\n 新たに クエストの経験値も預かれること:
By the way, we'd like to announce that we've added a new feature to the "Keep Experience" service... As before, if you select the
"Keep" option, you'll be able to keep your story clear experience as well as your quest clear experience... However, we'll only be
able to keep your quest experience the first time you complete it... When replaying the game, even if you set it to "Keep", you'll
receive it on the spot when you complete the game, so please understand beforehand...

Maze Ticket, you need to meet Mr. Dorothy in Port Lendor by yourself. I heard that you need to meet Mr. Dorothy at Port Lendor
to use the Metal Maze Ticket. To get to Ancient Zelmea, you need to go to the Isle of Ruins in the sea east of the Kingdom of Al-
Ahagiro.

304766.「ところで 私ども 旅のコンシェルジュで\n この度 新しいサービスを始めました:
By the way, we'd like to introduce to you our brand new service.
It's called the Metal Express Ticket service! You can exchange it the same way as the other Energy Charge items.
To use it, you'll need to bring it to Dorothy at Port Lendor, and you must be alone.
I'm sure you'll have an amazing metal "experience" using that ticket!

To use it, you'll need to bring it to Dorothy at Port Lendor, and you must be alone.
I'm sure it'll be a pretty exciting metal "experience" for you.

What a surprise! You can now exchange Metal Maze Express Tickets for Bonus Orbs. You need to meet Dorothy at Port Lendor by
yourself to use the Metal Maze Ticket, and you will surely have a great metal experience if you hand it to her. Please try to exchange
your ticket with Dorothy.
